questions.question: Can I participate online?
questions.answer: Yes, as long as there are 3 team members present in person.

questions.question: What happens if in the end I can't attend?
questions.answer: You can let us know by sending an email to inscripcions.datathon@aed.cat.

questions.question: Can I leave the faculty during the competition?
questions.answer: Of course! You are free to come and go as you please.

questions.question: Can I stay overnight?
questions.answer: Yes. We provide rooms for your rest. We recommend bringing a sleeping bag and a mat.

questions.question: Do I need to bring food?
questions.answer: We will provide breakfast, lunch, and dinner on Saturday, as well as breakfast and lunch on Sunday. You can bring your own snacks.

questions.question: What if I have specific dietary requirements (vegetarian, vegan, no pork, celiac, etc.)?
questions.answer: Don't worry! Indicate it during registration, and we will provide meals suitable for you.

questions.question: Can I connect to the internet?
What happens if I arrive late?
questions.answer: If you arrive before X o'clock, we will be in the Auditorium of X. If you arrive later, you will need to go to X. In any case, you will need to notify an organizer of your arrival.

questions.question: Is furry dress allowed to sleep and night coding?
Is there parking available?
Can I reuse code?
What prizes will there be?
How can I know if I am a rookie?
What happens if I made a mistake with the attached file?
What happens if I registered without a team, but now I have one?
questions.answer: If we decide to use forms, notify an organizer. If we decide on web registration, you can change it yourself.

questions.question: How should the CV be if I have little experience?
What happens if I don't have a team?
Until what day can I register?
Can I be a volunteer if I am a participant?
questions.answer: No, you cannot. We need fully involved volunteers.

questions.question: What tasks would I need to do?
questions.answer: You can choose one or more of the following options: Pre-event organization, Mentor, Logistics during the event.

questions.question: I am interested in being a sponsor for the Datathon. What should I do?
questions.answer: Send us an email to Datathon FME, and we will help you find a sponsorship that fits your company's needs.

questions.question: What should I know about previous editions?
